Package com.estg.core

Interface Institution

  • public interface Institution
    Contract representing an Aid Institution behaviour when dealing with Aid Boxes, containers and their measurements

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Getter for Institution name
        Returns:
        Institution name

      • addAidBox

        boolean addAidBox​(AidBox aidBox)
           throws AidBoxException
        Adds a new Aid Box to the Institution
        Parameters:
        aidBox - Aid Box
        Returns:
        1. true if the Aid Box was inserted in the collection storing all Aid Box
        2. false if the Aid Box already exists
        Throws:
        AidBoxException - if:
        1. The Aid Box is null
        2. The Aid Box is invalid, i.e. if the Aid Box have duplicate containers of a certain waste type

      • addMeasurement

        boolean addMeasurement​(Measurement measurement,
                       Container container)
                throws ContainerException,
                       MeasurementException
        Adds a new measurement to the Institution considering the Aid Box and container
        Parameters:
        measurement - Measurement considering the Aid Box and container
        container - The Container for the measurement
        Returns:
        1. true if the measurement was inserted in the collection storing all measurements
        2. false if the measurement already exists for a given date. (Each container has only one measurement for a given date)
        Throws:
        ContainerException - if the container doesn't exist
        MeasurementException - if the value is lesser than 0 and higher to the capacity

      • getAidBoxes

        AidBox[] getAidBoxes()
        Return a copy of a existing Aid Boxes
        Returns:
        a copy of a existing Aid Boxes

      • getContainer

        Container getContainer​(AidBox aidBox,
                       ContainerType containerType)
                throws ContainerException
        Return a copy of an existing container from a Aid Boxes and container type
        Parameters:
        aidBox - Aid Box for getting measurements
        containerType - item Type for getting measurements
        Returns:
        a copy of a existing containers
        Throws:
        ContainerException - if the Aid Box doesn't exist, or if a container with the given container type doesn't exist

      • getVehicles

        Vehicle[] getVehicles()
        Getter for a (deep) copy of the vehicles in the institution
        Returns:
        a (deep) copy of the vehicles in the institution

      • addVehicle

        boolean addVehicle​(Vehicle vehicle)
            throws VehicleException
        Adds a new vehicle to the institution
        Parameters:
        vehicle - vehicle to be added to the institution
        Returns:
        true if the vehicle was inserted in the collection storing all vehicles false if the vehicle already exists
        Throws:
        VehicleException - if:
        1. the vehicle is null

      • disableVehicle

        void disableVehicle​(Vehicle vehicle)
             throws VehicleException
        Disables a vehicle in the institution
        Parameters:
        vehicle - vehicle to be disabled
        Throws:
        VehicleException - if the vehicle does not exist or if the vehicle is already disabled

      • enableVehicle

        void enableVehicle​(Vehicle vehicle)
            throws VehicleException
        Enables a vehicle in the institution
        Parameters:
        vehicle - vehicle to be enabled
        Throws:
        VehicleException - if the vehicle does not exist or if the vehicle is already enabled

      • getPickingMaps

        PickingMap[] getPickingMaps()
        Getter for the picking maps in the institution
        Returns:
        the picking maps in the institution

      • getPickingMaps

        PickingMap[] getPickingMaps​(java.time.LocalDateTime from,
                            java.time.LocalDateTime to)
        Getter for the picking maps in the institution
        Parameters:
        from - start date
        to - end date
        Returns:
        the picking maps in the institution

      • getCurrentPickingMap

        PickingMap getCurrentPickingMap()
                         throws PickingMapException
        Getter for the current (most recent) picking map in the institution
        Returns:
        the current picking map in the institution
        Throws:
        PickingMapException - if there are no picking maps in the institution

      • addPickingMap

        boolean addPickingMap​(PickingMap pickingMap)
               throws PickingMapException
        Adds a new picking map to the institution
        Parameters:
        pickingMap - the picking map to be added to the institution
        Returns:
        true if the picking map was inserted in the collection storing all picking maps false if the picking map already exists
        Throws:
        PickingMapException - if the picking map is null

      • getDistance

        double getDistance​(AidBox aidBox)
            throws AidBoxException
        Getter for Distance between the instituition and parameter Aid Box.
        Parameters:
        aidBox - to the target.
        Returns:
        the distance.
        Throws:
        AidBoxException - if aid box does not exist.
